claimOwnership().details: This function is only callable by the `_pendingOwner`.

getNewestDrawSettings().details: Uses the nextDrawIndex to calculate the most recently added Draw.

getOldestDrawSettings().details: Finds the oldest Draw by buffer.nextIndex and buffer.lastDrawId

pushDrawSettings(uint32,(uint8,uint8,uin.details: Only callable by the owner or manager

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setDrawSetting(uint32,(uint8,uint8,uint3.details: Updating a Draw should be used sparingly and only in the event an incorrect Draw parameter has been stored.

setManager(address).details: Throws if called by any account other than the owner.

returns._0: Boolean to indicate if the operation was successful or not.

DrawSet(uint32,uint32,uint256).notice: Emit when a new draw has been created.

DrawSettingsSet(uint32,(uint8,uint8,uint.notice: Emitted when the DrawParams are set/updated

claimOwnership().notice: Allows the `_pendingOwner` address to finalize the transfer.

getDrawSetting(uint32).notice: Gets the PrizeDistributionHistorySettings for a Draw.drawID

getDrawSettings(uint32[]).notice: Gets array of PrizeDistributionHistorySettings for Draw.drawID(s)

getNewestDrawSettings().notice: Read newest DrawSettings from the draws ring buffer.

getOldestDrawSettings().notice: Read oldest DrawSettings from the draws ring buffer.

owner().notice: Returns the address of the current owner.

setDrawSetting(uint32,(uint8,uint8,uint3.notice: Set existing Draw in draws ring buffer with new parameters.

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows current owner to set the `_pendingOwner` address.

userdoc.notice: The PrizeDistributionHistory stores individual DrawSettings for each Draw.drawId. DrawSettings parameters like cardinality, bitRange, distributions, number of picks and prize. The settings determine the specific distribution model for each individual  draw. Storage of the DrawSetting(s) is handled by ring buffer with a max cardinality of 256 or roughly 5 years of history with a weekly draw cadence.
